text: Robert "Roby" Hosp (13 December 1939 – 5 October 2021) was a Swiss football forward. He played for Switzerland in the 1966 FIFA World Cup. He played for the team between 1960 and 1967.Copa do Mundo da FIFA Inglaterra 1966 He also played for FC Lausanne-Sport between 1959 until 1967. Hosp was born in Basel. Hosp died on 5 October 2021, at the age of 81.Roby Hosp, ex-vedette du Lausanne-Sport, s'en est allé ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swiss footballers Category:Sportspeople from Basel
title: Robert Hosp
